summary: An email from July 10, 2019, regarding FBI operations related to Jeffrey Epstein. It discusses the potential need to execute a search warrant at Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment, and requests assistance as most of the C20 team is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses planning to execute a search warrant at his Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email requesting assistance for the search warrant operation and victim interviews.

events.title: Planned Search Warrant at Epstein's Manhattan Residence
events.description: The email indicates a potential need to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: FBI Interviews Victims in Florida
events.description: Most of the C20 team is reported to be in Florida conducting interviews with victims.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, FBI personnel were planning a potential search warrant execution at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment.
Most of the FBI's C20 team was in Florida interviewing victims related to the Epstein case, creating a need for additional assistance in New York.
The email demonstrates active, multi-state investigative operations (New York and Florida) against Epstein in July 2019.
